title: Welcome to Hair By Page
subtitle: Specializing in Balayage, Extensions, and Fashion Colours

about.title: About Page
about.content: Page is a passionate and experienced hairdresser with 5+ years in the industry, staying up to date with current trends and constantly learning new techniques to broaden her abilities. Over the years Page has developed an expertise in blonding, extensions, and fashion colours. Page takes great pride in delivering personalized looks that make her clients feel confident and beautiful while maintaining healthy hair. Whether you're looking for a subtle touch-up or a bold new style, Page is here to help you achieve your hair goal!
